snippet: Hours after the boat tipped into the Niger River, only 210 of at least 400 passengers are reported to have been accounted for.
abstract: At least 20 people are killed and nearly 200 are missing after boat capsizes on Niger River in central Mali.
lead_paragraph: Hours after the boat tipped into the Niger River, only 210 of at least 400 passengers are reported to have been accounted for.

headline.main: Nearly 200 Missing After Boat Capsizes in River in Mali
headline.print_headline: Nearly 200 Missing After Boat Capsizes in River in Mali
